name: John Doe
details: John is a skilled frontend developer with 5 years of experience in React and Tailwind CSS, working on large-scale projects for international clients.

name: Jane Smith
details: Jane is an expert in creating engaging user interfaces with Figma and Adobe XD. She has a strong understanding of user experience principles.

name: Michael Lee
details: Michael has 7 years of experience in full stack development using Node.js and MongoDB. He is proficient in creating robust backend systems.

name: Sara Khan
details: Sara specializes in backend development with Python and Django. She is passionate about building scalable and secure APIs.

name: David Liu
details: David is a talented graphic designer with expertise in branding, illustration, and digital media, working with startups and established brands alike.

name: Emily Brown
details: Emily has 10 years of experience in managing product lifecycles and cross-functional teams, focusing on delivering high-quality digital products.
